LanguageData.TableSimpleProsthetic.label: prosthetic workbench
LanguageData.TableSimpleProsthetic.description: A workbench equipped for production of prosthesis.
LanguageData.TableBionics.label: bionics workbench
LanguageData.TableBionics.description: A workbench equipped for production of high tech bionics and implants. This advanced workbench is capable of assisting certain workstations by sharing some of its specialized fabrication system when placed near them.\n\nWhen placed near a prosthetic workbench, synthetic nano printer or fabrication bench, this workbench is able to increase their production speed. They can connect to a maximum of one bionics workbench.
LanguageData.TableOrgans.label: synthetic nano printer
LanguageData.TableOrgans.description: A fabrication workstation, equipped with a 3D printer to craft organs and complicated implants. This advanced workbench is capable of assisting certain workstations by sharing some of its specialized fabrication system when placed near them.\n\nWhen placed near a prosthetic workbench, bionics table or fabrication bench, this workbench is able to increase their production speed. They can connect to a maximum of one synthetic nano printer.
